name: Magic Jump!
description:
Magic Jump is a beautiful, infinite one-tap jumper, where your goal is to go as high as possible and not let the evil magic reach you. Grab power ups, collect coins and unlock all of the fun characters from the magical world.

Game Features:
* Free to play
* Endless gameplay
* Simple jump control
* Unlock new characters to continue the journey
* Challenge your friends with the best highscore
